about_the_game:
Wanna Leopold close to you?

This pack contains all sketches and Gallery images in HD resolution from Villain Project. You'll be able to check the first ideas for the puzzles as well as their final version. It's time to make your own wallpapers and/or remember how bad villains act. In a few words, you'll get:


  • 10 HD scenes from VIllain Project;
  • 13 sketches (check the evolution of the first concept until the last scene!);

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Villain Project\Art Pack

[This pack contains only the images in English version]

content_descriptors.notes: Villain Project contains full nudity, explicit male homosexual sex (oral, anal and group sex).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: All sketches and Villain Project's images in HD resolution. Check the evolution of the first concept until the last scene, make your own wallpapers and have fun without starting the game.
